# [FEAT] GDPR Compliance Tools

## Labels
`security`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement GDPR compliance tools for data privacy management.

## Requirements

### Data Subject Rights
- Right to access (data export)
- Right to erasure (data deletion)
- Right to rectification
- Right to data portability
- Right to object

### Data Access Requests
- User data export
- Exportable data inventory
- Export formats (JSON, CSV)
- Automated export
- Request tracking

### Data Deletion
- User deletion workflow
- Ticket anonymization
- Cascading deletion
- Deletion confirmation
- Deletion logs

### Consent Management
- Consent collection
- Consent tracking
- Consent withdrawal
- Purpose tracking
- Consent audit trail

### Data Processing
- Data processing records
- Lawful basis documentation
- Third-party data sharing
- Data retention policies
- Processing activity logs

### Privacy Features
- Data minimization tools
- Access restrictions
- Pseudonymization
- Data classification
- Privacy impact assessments

### Documentation
- Privacy policy integration
- Cookie consent
- Terms of service
- Data processing agreements

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk provides GDPR compliance tools and data privacy protection features.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Data export works
- [ ] Data deletion functional
- [ ] Consent tracking works
- [ ] Audit trails available
- [ ] Documentation complete
